Sentencas: Ion-electron mixed conductivity of the Ce1-xZrxO2 (0 < x < 1) series, prepared by solid-state reaction, has been measured as a function of temperature, pO(2) and pH(2)O relative pressures.
Titulo: Humidity Related LowTemperature Conductivity Hysteresis of Ce1-xZrxO2 (0 ≤ x ≤ 1) Ceramics. Structural Disorder Relationship

Sentencas: The structural analysis of this series shows the formation of monoclinic, tetragonal, and cubic phases as the Ce content increases.
Titulo: Humidity Related LowTemperature Conductivity Hysteresis of Ce1-xZrxO2 (0 ≤ x ≤ 1) Ceramics. Structural Disorder Relationship

Sentencas: The temperature used in samples preparation, 1,923 K, favors at intermediate compositions the homogeneous Ce and Zr mixing in the metastable tetragonal t' phase.
Titulo: Humidity Related LowTemperature Conductivity Hysteresis of Ce1-xZrxO2 (0 ≤ x ≤ 1) Ceramics. Structural Disorder Relationship

Sentencas: The variation of conductivity with the relative oxygen pressure indicates that electronic contribution increases, becoming preponderant, as the Ce-content increases.
Titulo: Humidity Related LowTemperature Conductivity Hysteresis of Ce1-xZrxO2 (0 ≤ x ≤ 1) Ceramics. Structural Disorder Relationship

Sentencas: The modifications in conductivity observed in Ce-rich samples have been ascribed to the enhancement of the electronic contribution at the grain-boundary of ceramics.
Titulo: Humidity Related LowTemperature Conductivity Hysteresis of Ce1-xZrxO2 (0 ≤ x ≤ 1) Ceramics. Structural Disorder Relationship

Sentencas: The differences observed at low temperatures in electronic dc-conductivity of Ce-rich samples during heating and cooling treatments, have been ascribed to the incorporation of water as hydroxide defects at the grain boundary and interior of the particles.
Titulo: Humidity Related LowTemperature Conductivity Hysteresis of Ce1-xZrxO2 (0 ≤ x ≤ 1) Ceramics. Structural Disorder Relationship

Sentencas: The surface hydroxylation is maximal in samples with improved OSC capacity, decreasing drastically in samples heated at 740 K.
Titulo: Humidity Related LowTemperature Conductivity Hysteresis of Ce1-xZrxO2 (0 ≤ x ≤ 1) Ceramics. Structural Disorder Relationship

Sentencas: Finally, the potential application of prepared materials in intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) is discussed.
Titulo: Humidity Related LowTemperature Conductivity Hysteresis of Ce1-xZrxO2 (0 ≤ x ≤ 1) Ceramics. Structural Disorder Relationship
